'''Asagiri''' is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] that appeared in [[Outside the Canvas, Inside the Lens]].

==Profile==
Asagiri is a freelance illustrator who draws light novel illustrations for the Yae Publishing House. Miss Moriko is the executive editor in charge of her work.

===Personality===
Asagiri has a timid personality, she's focused in her work which causes her to neglect her own health.

===Appearance===
Asagiri has a long black hair and fair skin, and wears a light blue kimono patterned with pink sakura flowers and a dark blue obi.
